name: Carpet Quest
description:
A carpet seller finds himself in a weird place with missing memories and a headache. He looks around to find answers and he sees a weird man and an incomplete painting.  This weird man confuses the carpet seller even more and sends him on a quest to find the missing painting pieces. On his quest, the carpet seller will find answers to questions he did not ask and will probably not learn a valuable lesson.

This is our first game, everything is in house, feedback very appreciated.

Known bugs:

- Some cutscenes are ended short.

-Some chests don't contain items.

-Some assets are missing in some levels.

-About button aborts the game.
